description: Media correspondents receive urgent instructions to coordinate a citywide broadcast for the Council's vote on the new BCI protocol amid unrest and a spreading heatwave.
Editorial teams gather for last-minute script planning; subtle hints about 'watching the counters' and 'bringing the truth to the surface' are woven into the launch materials.
The official voting broadcast goes live, with unprecedented turnout and conversation—while technical staff begin to quietly notice irregularities in the process.
